amendment.description: An amendment to add a new section at the end of the bill to make release of funds contingent upon an expression of opinion by the IG regarding an audit of financial statements of the Department.

action.text: Mr. Lewis (CA) raised a point of order against the Kucinich amendment (A002). Mr. Lewis (CA) stated that the amendment sought to impose new duties not authorized by law and as such, constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
